docket_entries.description: Chapter 7 Voluntary Petition, Schedules and Statements (except for those listed below). The mailing list of creditors if not uploaded when the petition was filed, must be uploaded no later than 5 calendar days from the date of the filing of the petition. Failure to timely upload the list of creditors, may result in dismissal of the case without further notice. Electronic Filing Declaration due 10/20/2009, filed by ALAN R. SOLOT of TILTON & SOLOT on behalf of JOHN W. McMANUS, BRENDA TAYLOR-McMANUS (SOLOT, ALAN) (Entered: 09/30/2009)
